Subject: Re: My Decepticons/Brotherhood-Hell Beast Battle
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Menasor looks around, having problems understanding the situation, "Why
Menasor not just kill Maximal then" he says in a low growl of a voice, "and
we kill the one at base tooo" he screamed threteningly. He then disingaged,
in a complex transformation, and flash of light, his legs turned into
Speedbreaker and Wildrider, who started to float again, and Wildrider had
an ugly smile, with half of his face missing, yet he was grinning with
glee. The middle section becomes Motormaster, and he grabs Firearm, on
hovers to land on top of Astroblast, and puts his cyclone gun to the robots
head. Meanwhile Dead-End and Drag Strip transform, Drag Strip starts to
soar, but the charred out body of Dead-End starts to plummet, motionless,
straight into Speedbreakers grip, who holds him firmly in mid air. (Okay
rAuq, theyre yours again). "Seriously Maximal, we have enough equipment in
Astroblast to patch him up to survive the trip. And I am not bluffing, if
we cant take him back to base, then he dies, as well as the other, do you
really want to be held responsible for two Maximals deaths, hah, that's not
very Maximal of you. And I dont bluff" screamed Motormaster with fury in
his eyes, he had had enough, and except for minor damage to his back and
neck, and a hole in his front, he was fine, and more than capable of firing
quickly.
